title: Molly-Mae Hague looks dramatically different as she shows off her wild 'lion mane'
text:

Molly-Mae Hague looked strikingly different in her latest Instagram snap.

Switching it up, the Instagram sensation changed up her look as she nailed a wild, crimped hairstyle.

The social media influencer, 20, changed things up from her usual straight and sleek hairdo in opt of a tousled curly crimp style as she promoted her latest venture with Beauty Works.

She captioned the stunning snap posted on Thursday: "Me and my lions mane."

Molly's impeccable hair extensions were a hot talking point throughout her time on Love Island this summer, as girls across the nation attempted to recreate how she styled her long luscious locks.

(Image: Instagram)

Whether she scraped her hair back into her now-famous bun or let her platinum blonde extensions fall around her shoulders in perfectly blow-dried waves, her hair was highly enviable.

One user commented on her freshly crimped hair: "It's not fair how you can pull off literally any hairstyle."

Another replied: "This hair!" followed by a lion and heart emoji.

Others responded: "Love this hairstyle on you!"

"OMG hair!!" followed by lots of heart eyes emojis.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

In October, it was announced that the social influencer collaborated with Beauty Works to share her hairstyle secrets with a series of products and hair extensions.

Her hair - particularly her bun - became famous while she was living out her romance on TV, and now, she helps people recreate her signature looks through her very own curl kit.

She said: "So I have used Beauty Works products for years now, before the summer, I've kind of been working with them for a long time, I adore them and think their products are incredible so it only felt right to make a move like this.

"Everyone kind of went mad for my hair recently and everyone has been asking so many questions and stuff so it felt right."

(Image: Hewitt / SplashNews.com)

The star – who came second place in the ITV2 show with boyfriend Tommy Fury – recently purchased an apartment with her new beau in Manchester .

The pair have been traveling none stop since leaving the villa and even recently visited New York City during Fashion Week to promote Molly-Mae's collection with fashion brand PrettyLittleThing .

The blonde bombshell has been in-demand from across the globe for her Pretty Little Thing deal, which reportedly landed her £500,000.
description: The Love Island star sported a crimped hairstyle instead of her usual iconic bun or signature waves
